title: Bubble Tea TUI for Claude Code release feature tracking
description:
Mini TUI using Bubble Tea to track Claude Code releases and features.

Goals:
- Display all features from a given Claude Code release
- Allow scrolling through individual features atomically
- Mark features as read when scrolled past (visual indicator)
- Only show unread features on subsequent views
- Prevent missing small cool features like Ctrl+S shortcuts

Key features:
- Parse Claude Code release notes/changelogs
- List view of all features per release
- Scroll interaction to mark items as read
- Persistent read state (so only new features show up)
- Clean, minimal TUI using Bubble Tea library
